citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:12 pm on 02
JUN 2025. The inspector contacted the registrant by calling the number on file but the registrant was not available. Failure
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:12 pm on 02 
JUN 2025. The inspector contacted the registrant by calling the number on file but the registrant was not available. Failure 
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
